snippet: For the American Ballet Theater principal dancer, control matters at home as well as on stage.
abstract: Marcello Gomes, principal dancer with American Ballet Theater, loves his subcompact one-bedroom condo in Hell's Kitchen, filled with blue and white vases, all gifts from friends.
lead_paragraph: For the American Ballet Theater principal dancer, control matters at home as well as on stage.

headline.print_headline: Where the Jeté in His Step Comes From
headline.main: Marcelo Gomes, the Dancer at Home in Hell’s Kitchen
